data.body: Implement a "foolery open" command that launches the browser UI if no compatible browser window is currently open, and add a notification/banner that appears only when a newer Foolery version is available.
data.description: Implement a "foolery open" command that launches the browser UI if no compatible browser window is currently open, and add a notification/banner that appears only when a newer Foolery version is available.
data.title: Add open command and update notice banner
